name: Human Cool Party
description:
HUMAN COOL PARTY Rythm Dialogue Puzzle Game made during GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Control an Alien who just crashed on earth and try to escape.

Help him to find his friend by reaching a DJ table to emit a signal.

Pretend to be human, blend in, be like them, talk like them.

And don't drink to much.

Control :

WASD to move character, mouse to move camera

SPACEBAR to talk to someone

Hold DIRECTION (up or down) to navigate and hit SPACEBAR to validate a word

Goal is to fill your cool bar to gain access to VIP room.

Game made by Cousin Bizarre Collective with Grégoire Delzongle, Pierre Herzig, Thibaut Jouhannet and Félix Pirritano.
